title: Purino
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Italian restaurant chain with labeled vegetarian and vegan dishes on the weekly menu and also on the standard menu. Vegans could get pasta with a small range of vegan sauces, a couple of the soups, a couple of the salads. Gluten-free rigatoni noodles.
